title: Can you use WhatsApp Web voice, video calls in UAE after recent updates?
summary_full: WhatsApp Web is rolling out voice and video calling worldwide. Users can now make calls directly from their browser. However, these features are blocked in the UAE. Local laws restrict Internet calling services. Residents can use approved apps like BOTIM and Zoom for voice and video calls. Messaging features on WhatsApp Web remain unaffected in the UAE.
